# Project Instructions

## Project Overview
- **Type**: PHP / Laravel Project
- **Frameworks**: Laravel, Tailwind CSS
- **Database**: MySQL
- **Language**: PHP, JavaScript

## Completed Setup Steps
- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project (Laravel installed)
- [x] Customize the Project (Tailwind CSS configured, MySQL configured)
- [x] Install Required Extensions (None specific required)
- [x] Compile the Project (Dependencies installed, migrations run)
- [x] Create and Run Task (Tasks created in .vscode/tasks.json)
- [x] Launch the Project (Ready to launch)
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Development Guidelines
- Use `php artisan serve` to run the Laravel backend.
- Use `npm run dev` to run the Vite development server for assets.
- Database is configured to use MySQL (database: `laravel`, user: `root`).
